steps.title: Creating entities in Entity Outliner
steps.content:
In the Entity Outliner, right-click on an empty area to reveal a context menu.

In the context menu, select Create entity (hotkey Ctrl + Alt + N).

A new entity is created and selected in both the Entity Outliner and the viewport.

steps.title: Creating entities in the viewport
steps.content:
In the Viewport, right-click to reveal a context menu.

In the context menu, select Create entity.

A new entity is created and selected in both the Entity Outliner and the viewport.
